features: [Effortless Correct Posture] Ergonomic based, Foamula proprietary CurVic Tec 2.0 office chair cushion is contour-shaped with 2 holes and a tailbone cutout to offload pressure on spinal discs, waist, tailbone, pelvic floor, and hamstring, allowing you to sit straight naturally and pain-free with improved postures.

[Health Keeper, Body Shaper] Foamula seat cushion smooths your sexy hip curve after strenuous gym time, kills sciatica and hip pain from long sessions of office work / gaming, and repairs pelvic floor muscles and relieves tailbone from compression for postpartum moms thanks to the unique C-shaped cutout.

[Certified Select Foam] Foamula seat cushion for office chair is OEKO-TEX certified with unequaled quality. High-density / elasticity memory foam of this coxyx seat cushion offers the perfect softness and support, working well on office chair, table chair, car seat, or wheelchair so that you can relax while maintaining a beautiful posture at any time.

[One for All] The car seat cushion measures 18.11"x 14.96" x 3.94", snugly fits any chairs, couches, or benches. It is a superb cozy-up accessory to your home, office, travel, car. Get this top-rated gift for your loved ones, and lift them up with boosted spirit and stance.

Take It Now, Decide Later - Foamula design and develop every product from the love for our planet and humankind. We offer 60 days hassle free return and refund, 24 hour after-sale service and are right by your side in case you have any issues
Gifts for Mother's Day, Father's Day, Birthday, Christmas presents, New Year Present,Valentine's Day presents
body.description: Ergonomic Correct Postures for A Fitter Body Foamula Memory Foam Seat Cushion In this era where fitness is an all-people game, more and more join in bodybuilding to reveal the beautiful curves of the body. Foamula Seat Cushions use the best slow rebound memory foam and lycra to ease off the pressure on the gluteal muscles and improve sitting posture. It's a game-changer for people looking for organic waist-hip health. Co-developed with physiotherapists, the cushion is ergonomically correct to help users sit comfortably over a long period of time. Repairs Pelvic Floor Muscles Kills Sciatica & Hip Pain Relieves Tailbone from Compression for Postpartum Smooths Your Sexy Hip Curve

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many options, which is best for my butt?
reviews.reviewText: I have had this for about 1 week and have been happy so far. It was firm out of the box, but it’s memory foam and already seems to be getting softer. I would agree that this is probably better for a small to medium backside. It fits me great. I also don’t think it’s overly hot, but I am naturally cold. I choose this one based on the number of positive reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and durable!
reviews.reviewText: This item is a must for everyone! All of us suffer some fatigue and discomfort in our backs at some point. This item is a sure way to help alleviate that in a noninvasive way! Kudos Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars How I got Comfort after a prior injury
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and supportive. Very little pain after sitting for long periods of time after having a prior injury to my coccyx bone.The only thing that I disliked was not getting the two extra cushion covers to change out from the original if needing to be washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Due to handicap in chair 12hr daily and back hurts all the time.
reviews.reviewText: It really alleviated the pain and works really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's just a bit better than a pillow but nothign special
reviews.reviewText: So i recently had hip replacement surgery and am waiting for my other hip to be replaced. Sitting on my computer chair while trying to work can be a nightmare so before i got a new chair i figured i would in the meantime get a cushion. Well, I'm going to have to get something different. It's not comfortable and seems to only stay in place or not hurt other parts of my body like my back if i sit up on it instead of how i should sit in it and then it slips away and the cushion seems to be not very good because after about an hour it feels like I'm sitting on a hardware floor. I gave it 3 stars because it doesn't hurt my hip. but just my butt. So it kind of worked. Just not for me so I'll be searching again for something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down the best seat cushion to relieve tailbone pain from extended sitting. I was struggling with my tailbone pain for 2 weeks and when this came in the mail and I put it on my seat at work I felt so supported with the perfect amount of give. I will say that if you have a wider backside you might need to get the bigger size as the small one fits me perfectly but if I was any bigger it would be too small. I have legit recommended this to coworkers and friends because I want the best for them any myself so if you’re struggling with tailbone pain pls do yourself a favor and buy this I promise it’s worth it. ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A vacation for my butt
reviews.reviewText: I took a cross country road trip this summer. While my car is comfortable, I knew that after about hour 3 in the driver's seat, the gluteus maximus would protest. Before the trip, I tried many different cushions. My only misgiving was that it was thicker than any other one and I sat a little higher in the seat. I lowered my chair as low as it went and test drove it for a week before I left. In combination with a lumbar pillow I strapped to the seat, this seemed like a winning combination.I drove 9-12 hour days. It was like sitting on a cloud. When I would sit on the edge of the hotel bed at night and assess if I needed any Tylenol or Ibuprofen, I would realize that my back, shoulders, and rear end were not in pain. I would wake up in the morning and I knew it was the crappy hotel bed that made me achy and I would hurry to get in the driver's seat to relieve my pain. I do wish it was thinner so that I could take it on a plane and not feel like a toddler in a booster seat. But in the car, I sit like a queen on my throne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly not comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I don't feel it did anything special. It wasn't comfortable, the small was too big. It didn't feel supportive. At least, more so than any other butt pillow. Less so, even. It's weirdly floppy and awkward. I'm bony as hell and it wasn't thick enough. Would do the same job as sitting on a pillow for more money. Meh. 👎🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable support for lower back pain
reviews.reviewText: I have a herniated disk and sitting for any long period isn't advised- but I have to work so I have to sit.I wasn't expecting a miracle but I can honestly say that this cushion has increased the length of time I can sit for before experiencing pain. Whereas before I would be feeling twinges after about 20mins of sitting, I can now sit for 1/2 hours before experiencing any pain.I also appreciate the little guide included with washing instructions and some exercises/holds to help alleviate pain by strengthening the glutes and lower back muscles. I haven't checked out their site but they have video tutorials available too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great cushion well designed and it does take the pressure of the hip joints, would be perfect for long distance drivers or office workers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Poor Quality: Broken foam after less than 2 months!
reviews.reviewText: When the product arrived I was so excited. It is very comfortable and supportive! I even ordered one for my housemate. Unfortunately, after less than two months the foam has broken and degraded. My product might have been deffective as my housemate's one is fine. Still irritating though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 16, 2023
